channel.title: ServerStatus - Help!
channel.description:
Moparscape's server status isn't working when i register a server? Ive registerd the right IP and Port and it will say..
[code]New server Old.:.Dutch -508Web succesfully posted, however it will not show up on the list until it has been approved. Please allow at least 24 hours for the approval process. In order for it to be approved it must be online at the time it is checked again, if not online it will be deleted and you may post it again later. Click here to return to main page.[/code]
Ive added the server around 7Times in the past 3days waiting around 4hours of each add and it isn't adding.. Please can someone inform a Admin or somthink or tell me whats wrong..?

item.title: ServerStatus - Help!
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

No one - you wait your time. It usually doesn’t take long.

Read full topic

item.title: ServerStatus - Help!
item.dc:creator: @Old_Dutch Old~Dutch
item.description:
@Old_Dutch wrote:

A thew week backs i added a server it was on status in a flash…
how would i hurry up the confirmation? who would i pmed? Maybe?

Read full topic

item.title: ServerStatus - Help!
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Old~Dutch, post:3, topic:263361”][quote author=twins link=topic=347840.msg2677528#msg2677528 date=1235166564]
you have to wait for aproval… from admins
[/quote]
Aproval for the server status when did that come in??[/quote]

About a month ago.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Old_Dutch wrote:

Moparscape’s server status isn’t working when i register a server?
Ive registerd the right IP and Port and it will say…

New server Old.:.Dutch -508Web succesfully posted, however it will not show up on the list until it has been approved. Please allow at least 24 hours for the approval process. In order for it to be approved it must be online at the time it is checked again, if not online it will be deleted and you may post it again later. Click here to return to main page.

Ive added the server around 7Times in the past 3days waiting around 4hours of each add and it isn’t adding…
Please can someone inform a Admin or somthink or tell me whats wrong…?
